description: This meal-worthy vegan spinach salad has pan-fried lemon tofu, creamy avocado ranch and crispy bacon roasted chickpeas.
name: Vegan Spinach Salad with Avocado Ranch and Chickpea Bacon
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup + 2 tbsp. unflavored soy or almond milk
1 lb. extra firm tofu (drained and pressed at least 30 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Place avocado in food processor or blender. Blend until smooth.
Add garlic, parsley and chives. Pulse a few times to blend.
Add milk, lemon juice, vinegar, onion powder, salt and pepper. Blend until smooth.Add a few dashes more of milk and blend again if the mixture seems too thick.
